result.adr_address: Andriya Malyshka St, 2, Kyiv, Ukraine, 02000
result.name: Гостідзе

reviews.text: It was the first time in this establishment. I liked everything, the food was so delicious that I ordered it for home. Service for all 10, the waiter Nadiya perfectly understood everything according to the order, since we were with a child. Thank you for the wonderful evening and the mood you gave us.

Finally, an establishment opened in Darnytsia, where you can go with the whole family or invite friends or hold a meeting.

Kitchen - 5/5. Here you will find the main dishes of Georgian cuisine. Personally, we ordered a set of three chebureks for UAH 174, with two types of meat (lamb and another) and cheese - very tasty, and a set of khinkali with 7 or 8 different fillings. We also tasted barbecue - it is also worth paying attention to.

Atmosphere 5/5 - they treat you with a glass of their signature wine. Polite and unobtrusive waiters. Nice interior

Definitely recommend

I was with my sister, I have never seen such a disrespectful attitude from the service in any establishment. The manner of communication of the waiter (there was no badge to find out the name)..the phrase "you eat without appetite, they also ordered khinkali, why...". They put me in a stupor. Everything from the order was delicious, but the serving of champignons finished (the photo is missing two pieces, but it does not change the point).. the menu is like Gaga, the prices are inflated.

I reserved a table in my name for today, March 8. I was told that there will be a lower hall and there will be karaoke. I asked if there was a place upstairs when booking a table, I was told no. Well, I wanted to come, so I came today (I reserved a table for three), the lower hall.
They came We waited for 20 minutes for someone to come. Waiter Olya (in black, not in uniform, like all waiters). I was asked in whose name (Ruslan or my name) the table was reserved and whether it was reserved 🙈 The order was made, the waiter wrote everything down in a notebook and left. As a result, we waited for that order for an hour!!! And no one came forward to say anything when the order would be even partially. But even drinks... I had to run and catch. That is, it is realistic to go after the waiter and have time to ask before she ran away. Drinks stood at the point where orders are entered into the computer ready to be served for 20 minutes, and after questioning and tugging at the waiter, they finally brought it to the table. Pepsi is already warm in a glass in bottles ((The order included 2 salads, sliced ​​meat, baklava, cappuccino, 3 Pepsi, fries and 15 nuts with it.
As a result, one salad was simply forgotten, when it became clear, I told them not to do it. The fries were overcooked and barely warm when they arrived on the table, they probably forgot to salt them.
Cappuccino was brought, it had already cooled before they brought (again after my questions to the waiter and waiting for half an hour!!!) baklava. Cappuccino was replaced with a warm one.
The music and karaoke are loud and I had to shout to be heard at the table.
The distance between the tables is less than in McDonald's. It is very uncomfortable when someone is too close to my table, food, communication at my table.
5 peanuts turned out to be...
What was the point of writing in a notebook then if you forgot about the salad and did not hear about the amount of dessert? Why am I, as a client, just left to wait for an unknown amount of time without any information?
People came to the next table, they immediately took their orders and after 15 minutes they had both food and drinks on the table. What is this relationship? Why do I have to watch someone eat while I'm being served and ignored?!
Sadly. Upstairs there was a free table all this time!((((
Very long, left after 2 hours. I have a spoiled evening and holiday mood. Because of this service. Zero communication from staff to guest. Instead of the festive mood and atmosphere, I have to run and catch the waiter, who has been bringing me drinks for an hour and says "right now, I'll check" and comes half an hour later. I just wanted to get up, leave and not come back.
It's a shame about the time and that the evening is ruined, I would rather book a table elsewhere.

Congratulations!
We visited this restaurant yesterday, everything was great! Very attentive waiters, taking into account the fact that the hall was almost full, the waitress Lisa came to us often, the table was quickly cleaned of used napkins, dirty dishes, etc. The dishes were brought quickly, everything was delicious. Very interesting menu and good prices. I sincerely recommend visiting this place to all lovers of Georgian cuisine
